# BITSY VERSION 4.5

DLG ITM_4

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_0
fuck, im hungry

DLG ITM_1
you need to eat some food but like, everything is closed. you're also too tired to look  in a direction moving away from your apartment. Good Luck!

DLG SPR_1
The mall is, of course, closed, though you can see the lights of some ads from the outside.

DLG SPR_2
here's the town square with a nice coffee shop on it. The fountains splash playfully! of course none of it is useful to you at this time.

DLG SPR_3
holy shit thats a huge seagull... uh... try not to make eye contact

DLG SPR_4
the seagulls walk the streets at night like mini velociraptors

DLG SPR_5
these are their streets, we're just biding our time

DLG SPR_6
THE TESCO!!! Ahh of course the Tesco is closed, you absolute fool! you dummy!! the gate is only halfway down and there's still a bunch of people shuffling around in there but it's CLOSED CLOSED CLOSED so find an alternative before you suffer a Tesco Hubris Death.

DLG ITM_2
this is a bar where music is playing really loudly and theres a bunch of women in tight, shiny dresses piling out of a cab nearby. I mean, they probably serve food but what the hell..... dont go in there

DLG ITM_3
you have gone to this kebab shop so many times just because it is almost exactly across the street from your apartment. it's... like... alright ok. one time the donner meat was dried out like plastic and your stomach felt like a giant lead weight afterwards but that never stopped you from going back because... you know...

DLG ITM_4
oh my god it's mcdonalds. the mcdonalds is open!! sorry, I know, it's bad but some times you just have to... you know.

END 0
you go home without eating anything. you think about ordering out but it's too expensive, so you do something stupid like eat all your breakfast cereal. BAD END

END 1
you get doner chips from the alright chippy. it's alright. your stomach feels a little uneasy but you'll be fine... this time. GOOD END

END 2
MCDONALDS! MCDONALDS! MCDONALDS! MCDONALDS! MCDONALDS! MCDONALDS!  ... you only slightly regret it. 

END 3
god i've never even done this for fear it would be too awkward so I imagine going in this bar alone and trying to order food for yourself would just be very awkward. AWKWARD END

VAR a
